name: Michael Jordan in Flight
description:
Michael Jordan in Flight is a sports game developed by Pacific Gameworks and ZCT Systems Group. It was originally released in 1992. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Michael Jordan in Flight on PC.
It was produced by Jim Rushing. Alistair Hirst, Edwin Dolinski and Krisjan Hatlelid scored the game.
